message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm happy to offer it to you at $2,000,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $1,250,000. This is my best offer, and I hope we can find common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, the product's value is significantly higher than what you're proposing. I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000. This is a very competitive price considering the value this product brings.

Alice, I understand the value of the product, but $1,800,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,400,000. This is a significant increase from my previous offer, and I believe it's fair considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your willingness to negotiate. I'm seeing your commitment to reaching a deal. I can go down to $1,600,000.  This offer reflects the true value of this product and leaves us both with a fair outcome.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,600,000 is still outside my range. I'm willing to go up to $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair price considering both our needs, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
